title: Fun Moments at the Golden Globes Awards Show
summary: The Golden Globes is a big awards show for movies and TV that starts the awards season in Hollywood. This year, it had many funny and exciting moments. The host, Nikki Glaser, told jokes about famous people like George Clooney and Leonardo DiCaprio, and made fun of things like TV news and movie studios. A singer-actress won an award and gave a nice speech to encourage young girls. Amy Poehler won an award for her podcast and was very happy to get it from Snoop Dogg. The show also had K-Pop music and other fun parts. It was a night full of laughter and celebration for the stars.
